named-native-query.name: Pacientes.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: select date_format(p.data_cadastro, '%Y/%m') mes, count(*) total from paciente p where p.data_cadastro > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) group by date_format(p.data_cadastro, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(p.data_cadastro, '%Y/%m') desc
